channel.title: Very Angry And Confused need help with no-ip
channel.description:
well ok i just got figmentscape source and when i run it it says its online.
i have No-ip duc it goes like updating hosts jayarscape.no-ip.biz update DNS update successful and stuff
so when i go on client.silabsoft.org i type in my user and pass and when i type in ip it doesnt work :confused:
it only works when i type in 127.0.0.1 or nothing! help

item.title: Very Angry And Confused need help with no-ip
item.dc:creator: @killar6311 killar6311
item.description:
@killar6311 wrote:

When you log into the server from your own computer (the computer hosting it actually) you don’t need to enter the ip and if you do it won’t work.Doesn’t mean others can’t.I hope I helped,

Read full topic
item.source: Very Angry And Confused need help with no-ip

item.title: Very Angry And Confused need help with no-ip
item.dc:creator: @Jayar1 Jayar_
item.description:
@Jayar1 wrote:

[quote=“Gh0stb4rr4g3, post:3, topic:229304”]Yes Portforward.

I’ll get you the TuT for it.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 02, 2008, 06:39:12 am[/size][hr]2 Make a Hamachi Server:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,301718.0.html (No Portforwarding needet!)

And for no-ip Server (Portforward TuT)

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Hope this helped.[/quote]

well hope this works ima follow it and read verrrrryyy carefully lol

item.title: Very Angry And Confused need help with no-ip
item.dc:creator: @sw1tchez sw1tchez
item.description:
@sw1tchez wrote:

Lol. When you log in, you can’t use your ip, nobody can, only if its hamachi, use 0.0.0.0, localhost, or 127.0.0.1

Read full topic
